title: Unprotected Windows Messaging Channel (&#x27;Shatter&#x27;)
overview: The software does not properly verify the source of a message in the Windows Messaging System while running at elevated privileges, creating an alternate channel through which an attacker can directly send a message to the product.
remediation: ::PHASE:Architecture and Design:STRATEGY::EFFECTIVENESS::DESCRIPTION:Always verify and authenticate the source of the message.::
